item.title: [sld] Shadowborn Apostle
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Lightning Strike
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [one] Kaito, Dancing Shadow
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kaito

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may return one of them to its owner's hand. If you do, you may activate loyalty abilities of Kaito twice this turn rather than only once.

+1: Up to one target creature can't attack or block until your next turn.

0: Draw a card.

−2: Create a 2/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token with deathtouch and "When this creature leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life."

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1606696227189440512

item.title: [sld] Thought-Knot Seer
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi

({C} represents colorless mana.)

When Thought-Knot Seer enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

item.title: [sld] Leeching Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Whenever a Sliver you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Muscle Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

item.title: [slp] Plague Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 1 damage to you."

item.title: [sld] Basal Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "Sacrifice this permanent: Add {B}{B}."

item.title: [sld] Dregscape Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Each Sliver creature card in your graveyard has unearth {2}.

Unearth {2} ({2}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [sld] Homing Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}.

Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [sld] Necrotic Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "{3}, Sacrifice this permanent: Destroy target permanent."

item.title: [sld] Pulmonic Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have flying.

All Slivers have "If this permanent would be put into a graveyard, you may put it on top of its owner's library instead."

item.title: [sld] Shadow Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have shadow. (They can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

item.title: [sld] Quick Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Flash

Any player may cast Sliver spells as though they had flash.

item.title: [sld] Telekinetic Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "{T}: Tap target permanent."

item.title: [sld] Toxin Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [sld] Virulent Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.title: [slp] Fatal Push
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.

Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [slp] Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Monkey Pirate

Whenever Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

item.title: [slp] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [sld] Fabled Passage
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

item.title: [one] Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Vigilance

If a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities of permanents your opponents control to trigger.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [khm] Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Trample, haste

If you would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put twice that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.

If an opponent would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, they put half that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead, rounded down.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [snc] Urabrask, Heretic Praetor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Haste

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, the next time they would draw a card this turn, instead they exile the top card of their library. They may play it this turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [dmu] Sheoldred, the Apocalypse
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Deathtouch

Whenever you draw a card, you gain 2 life.

Whenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 2 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [neo] Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Whenever you cast an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

Whenever an opponent casts an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, counter that spell. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Vigilance

If a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities of permanents your opponents control to trigger.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Phyrexian Obliterator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Trample

Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Slobad, Iron Goblin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Goblin Artificer

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add an amount of {R} equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Koth, Fire of Resistance
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Koth

+2: Search your library for a basic Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

−3: Koth, Fire of Resistance deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Jor Kadeen, First Goldwarden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rebel

Trample

Whenever Jor Kadeen, First Goldwarden attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of equipped creatures you control. Then if Jor Kadeen's power is 4 or greater, draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [ppro] Aether Vial
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial.

{T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Zur the Enchanter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Flying

Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.description:

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature with mana value X or less. If X is 5 or more, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
